nodes.text: Ool was a forested planet located in Chiss Space's Ool system. A hyperlane linked the world to the Avidich and Shihon systems. The sentient Chiss of the Chiss Ascendancy established large circular plots of farmland across the surface of Ool.
Ool was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square E-8.
